label.en:
Do you have a personal sim card/mobile phone number?

If you do not have a personal sim card/mobile phone number, nominate someone who you TRUST and is comfortable receiving the MONEY (Cash Transfer) on your behalf.

PLEASE NOTE: The nominated person MUST have a phone number REGISTERED with Safaricom using their OWN National ID.
Is the phone number registered with Safaricom using your National ID?
Which phone number do you want to receive your M-Pesa code on? (With country-code. It should look like: +254 000 000 000)
